Class Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Game class
Author:
Marie-Almina, Tayeb

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Board board
    Board used for the game
    private De de
    Dice that will be used by the players
    private java.util.List<Rider> riders
    List of the players of the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Game()
    Default constructor of game, Call the other constructor with the size 16
    Game​(int size)
    Constructor of Game, Create a dice, add two riders to the list, Create and initialize a board of size size

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void end​(Rider r)
    Prints the results of the race
    private void go​(Rider r1, Rider r2, int de)
    Allows to move a player of a number of case given by the dice, If it lands on the same case as the other rider the other rider will be sent back to it's start, and if the rider is already on it's start it will go back to it's stable.
    private void goStable​(Rider r)
    Sends a rider back to the stable cell
    private void goStart​(Rider r)
    Sends a rider back to the start cell
    void play​(int first)
    The game loop, Calls the function turn for each turn of each player, If one player win ends the game loop and calls end()
    java.lang.String toString()
    Call to string of board with the riders of the game
    private boolean turn​(Rider r1, Rider r2)
    Allows to make a turn, Ask the player to press enter to roll the dice (or to enter the value for the evaluation version).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • riders

      private java.util.List<Rider> riders
      List of the players of the game

    • board

      private Board board
      Board used for the game

    • de

      private De de
      Dice that will be used by the players

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Default constructor of game, Call the other constructor with the size 16

    • Game

      public Game​(int size)
      Constructor of Game, Create a dice, add two riders to the list, Create and initialize a board of size size
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the board that will be created

  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play​(int first)
      The game loop, Calls the function turn for each turn of each player, If one player win ends the game loop and calls end()
      Parameters:
      first - The first player to play (1 for red)

    • go

      private void go​(Rider r1, Rider r2, int de)
      Allows to move a player of a number of case given by the dice, If it lands on the same case as the other rider the other rider will be sent back to it's start, and if the rider is already on it's start it will go back to it's stable. Prints the result of the process of the cell
      Parameters:
      r1 - The first rider
      r2 - The other rider
      de - The value of the dice rolled by the player

    • goStart

      private void goStart​(Rider r)
      Sends a rider back to the start cell
      Parameters:
      r - The rider

    • goStable

      private void goStable​(Rider r)
      Sends a rider back to the stable cell
      Parameters:
      r - The rider

    • turn

      private boolean turn​(Rider r1, Rider r2)
      Allows to make a turn, Ask the player to press enter to roll the dice (or to enter the value for the evaluation version). Then prints information on this turn (who plays and how much), Checks on witch cell the player is and then if he can move, If he can move it moves it to the right cell using go
      Parameters:
      r1 - The first rider
      r2 - The other rider
      Returns:
      True if the player has won (if he is on the finished line) false otherwise

    • end

      private void end​(Rider r)
      Prints the results of the race
      Parameters:
      r - The winner

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Call to string of board with the riders of the game
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      toString of board using the riders
